name: Fortune Street 2: Rolling Again
summary: Fortune Street 2: Rolling Again is a fan made, non official project that provides a new wave of customly created content for western fans of the Wii release who dream for a successor. This version of Fortune Street also contains a rule pack designed to rebalance certain aspects of the game and add quality of life enhancements that the stages are specifically built around. Altered text files, swapped backgrounds, and music files will all be included in the files you need to replace to play the game.
